page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: WATERCRESS BEDS cont. The watercress takes from seed eight weeks to grow and the colour of the seed is brown and orange. At the springs we lifted the lid up which had a brick over it and there was water flowing.Then we walked along a track and pushed the trolley and saw Mr.Sansom and asked him what he was doing and he was clearing weed out of the water.After that we walked through the clean water back to the house.They said that the temperature of the water was the same all the year round. We asked them if they liked the hours they work and they said they work eleven hours a day and it was hard work but gave great satisfaction.
